panels.description: Средние значения измерений, сгруппированные по целям ping запросов

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (destination_node) (increase(kube_node_ping_packets_sent_total{instance=~"$source_node", destination_node_ip_address=~"$destination_node"}[$__range]))
  -
  sum by (destination_node) (increase(kube_node_ping_packets_received_total{instance=~"$source_node", destination_node_ip_address=~"$destination_node"}[$__range]))
)
/
  sum by (destination_node) (increase(kube_node_ping_packets_sent_total{instance=~"$source_node", destination_node_ip_address=~"$destination_node"}[$__range]))

(
  sum by (destination_node) (increase(kube_node_ping_packets_sent_total{instance=~"$source_node", destination_node_ip_address=~"$destination_node"}[$__rate_interval]))
  -
  sum by (destination_node) (increase(kube_node_ping_packets_received_total{instance=~"$source_node",destination_node_ip_address=~"$destination_node"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
/
  sum by (destination_node) (increase(kube_node_ping_packets_sent_total{instance=~"$source_node", destination_node_ip_address=~"$destination_node"}[$__rate_interval]))
